question.title: Cannot connect to VM Socket operation on nonsocket: configureBlocking
question.body:
I'm struggling since 2 days trying to solve this issue on Eclipse/Spring Tool Suite:

Cannot connect to VM 
 Socket operation on nonsocket: configureBlocking

Java version:

openjdk version "1.8.0_442"
OpenJDK Runtime Environment (Temurin)(build 1.8.0_442-b06)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (Temurin)(build 25.442-b06, mixed mode)

Spring Tool Suite version:

sts-4.5.1.RELEASE

I'm able to run the project using .bat file and reach the swagger, so there is no issue with java installation, or with the project.

But I have to debug it, so I need the IDE, which was perfectly working till 2 days ago. What happened 2 days ago is that the company requires new windows update, which I did, then sts was not working anymore.

Any idea on what should I check, install or reinstall ?
